definition: to eavesdrop/to tap (telephone conversations)/to intercept and investigate
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages

sentences.english: To do this, we must listen for events.
sentences.chinese: 要做到這一點，我們必須偵聽事件。

sentences.english: When writing listeners, you should always be aware of the environment in which they will execute.
sentences.chinese: 在編寫偵聽器時，應當一直注意它們將要執行的環境。

sentences.english: Verify that the listener program is starting the channel on the correct queue manager.
sentences.chinese: 證明偵聽器程序正開始通道在恰當隊列管理器上。

sentences.english: Message listener ports have to be configured at server scope.
sentences.chinese: 消息偵聽器端口必須在服務器範圍配置。

sentences.english: She broke radio contact when she realized she was being intercepted.
sentences.chinese: 當她意識到她被偵聽時，她中斷了無線電聯繫。

sentences.english: Listeners identified as shared listeners can be added to sources or traces by name.
sentences.chinese: 標識爲共享偵聽器的偵聽器可按名稱添加到源或跟蹤。

sentences.english: Listeners identified as shared listeners can be added to sources or traces by name.
sentences.chinese: 標識爲共享偵聽器的偵聽器可按名稱添加到源或跟蹤。

sentences.english: Only notifications which the filter allows are passed to the listener.
sentences.chinese: 只有過濾器允許的通知纔可被傳遞到偵聽器。

sentences.english: The Maximum Messages value is set on the listener port, along with the Maximum Sessions concurrency setting.
sentences.chinese: 在偵聽器端口設置最大消息值及最大會話併發數。

sentences.english: If you've added custom listener ports, these might not be needed.
sentences.chinese: 如果您已經添加自定義偵聽端口，則可能不需要這些。

sentences.english: EventListeners registered as capturers will not be triggered during this phase.
sentences.chinese: 作爲捕獲者的事件偵聽器在這個過程中不會被觸發。

sentences.english: Before it can listen for clients, it must do a bit of housekeeping.
sentences.chinese: 在它能夠偵聽客戶機之前，必須進行一些內部操作。

sentences.english: One approach that is sometimes suggested for dealing with lapsed listeners is to use weak references.
sentences.chinese: 有時推薦的一個處理失效偵聽器的方法是使用弱引用。

sentences.english: A sonar array is a radar towed behind a ship that listens and locates underwater sounds.
sentences.chinese: 聲納陣列雷達拖着船舶偵聽和位於水下聲音。

sentences.english: This prevents packet sniffing applications from eavesdropping on the communication.
sentences.chinese: 這就防止了數據包偵聽應用程序偷聽通信。

sentences.english: These methods will in turn call the listeners in whatever thread they were called.
sentences.chinese: 這些方法又會在調用它們的線程中調用偵聽器。
